content: top of next 11 single_crochet from previous round 1st single_crochet may be hidden 1 bphdc around next 2 fpdc 1 half_double_crochet over top of next 11 single_crochet from previous round 5 fpdc around next fpdc ** repeat from * to ** 2 more times 1 half_double_crochet over top of next 11 single_crochet from previous round 1 bphdc in next 2 fpdc 1 half_double_crochet over top of last 9 single_crochet from previous round slip_stitch to 1st st 88 half_double_crochet 8 bphdc 20 fpdc round 16 chain 1 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 1 single_crochet chain 1 1 single_crochet in next st should be 3rd of 5 fpdc the corner st *1 single_crochet in next 28 sts 1 single_crochet chain 1 1 single_crochet in next st should be 3rd of 5 fpdc the corner st ** repeat from * to ** 2 more times 1 single_crochet in last 25 sts slip_stitch to 1st st cut yarn leaving a long tail to weave in 120 single_crochet the end congrats on completing the full square imma keep shinin here s the link to the youtube video tutorial if you need any help https //youtu be/mfqzui3axvk si=ml4oxvqsz8jcnohw copyright 2024 this is a free pattern created by myself jesus santiago chupi ravelry handle = @justchupi143 on 12/13/2024 please do not claim any part of this pattern as your own …or alter it in any way shape or form and claim it as your own design please do not sell this pattern anywhere for any reason feel free to make as many of these squares as you wish and even include them in any works that you wish to sell i ask that you give credit where credit is due though and mention where you obtained the pattern from if you post online anywhere for any reason any of the following options would suffice please & thank you 1 include a link in your post to either the written pattern on my ravelry profile or a link to my youtube tutorial 2 mention one of my social media accounts or use one of the hashtags below on your post social media handles instagram youtube tiktok and ravelry = @justchupi143 hashtags #goodmorningstarshinesquare #immakeepshininsquare
